verses.verse: When I would heal <S%H7495><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> then the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> is uncovered, <S%H1540><s%> also the wickedness <S%H7451><s%> of Samaria; <S%H8111><s%> for they commit <S%H6466><s%> falsehood, <S%H8267><s%> and the thief <S%H1590><s%> enters in, <S%H935><s%> and the gang <S%H1416><s%> of robbers ravages <S%H6584><s%> outside. <S%H2351><s%>

They don't <S%H559><s%> consider in their hearts <S%H3824><s%> that I remember <S%H2142><s%> all their wickedness. <S%H7451><s%> Now their own deeds <S%H4611><s%> have engulfed <S%H5437><s%> them. <S%H6440><s%> They are before my face.
They make the king <S%H4428><s%> glad <S%H8055><s%> with their wickedness, <S%H7451><s%> and the princes <S%H8269><s%> with their lies. <S%H3585><s%>

They are all adulterers. <S%H5003><s%> They are burning <S%H1197><s%> like an oven <S%H8574><s%> that the baker <S%H644><s%> stops <S%H7673><s%> stirring, <S%H5782><s%> from the kneading <S%H3888><s%> of the dough, <S%H1217><s%> until it is leavened. <S%H2556><s%>

On the day <S%H3117><s%> of our king, <S%H4428><s%> the princes <S%H8269><s%> made themselves sick <S%H2470><s%> with the heat <S%H2534><s%> of wine. <S%H3196><s%> He joined <S%H4900><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> with mockers. <S%H3945><s%>

For they have prepared <S%H7126><s%> their heart <S%H3820><s%> like an oven, <S%H8574><s%> while they lie in wait. <S%H693><s%> Their baker <S%H644><s%> sleeps <S%H3463><s%> all the night. <S%H3915><s%> In the morning <S%H1242><s%> it burns <S%H1197><s%> as a flaming <S%H3852><s%> fire. <S%H784><s%>

They are all hot <S%H2552><s%> as an oven, <S%H8574><s%> and devour <S%H398><s%> their judges. <S%H8199><s%> All their kings <S%H4428><s%> have fallen. <S%H5307><s%> There is no one among them who calls to me. <S%H7121><s%>
Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> he mixes <S%H1101><s%> himself among the nations. <S%H5971><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> is a pancake <S%H5692><s%> not turned over. <S%H2015><s%>

Strangers <S%H2114><s%> have devoured <S%H398><s%> his strength, <S%H3581><s%> and he doesn't <S%H3045><s%> realize it. <S%H7872><s%> Indeed, gray hairs are here and there <S%H2236><s%> on him, <S%H3045><s%> and he doesn't realize it.

The pride <S%H1347><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> testifies <S%H6030><s%> to his face; <S%H6440><s%> yet they haven't <S%H7725><s%> returned to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> their God, <S%H430><s%> nor sought him, <S%H1245><s%> for all this.

"Ephraim <S%H669><s%> is like an easily deceived <S%H6601><s%> dove, <S%H3123><s%> without understanding. <S%H3820><s%> They call <S%H7121><s%> to Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> They go <S%H1980><s%> to Assyria. <S%H804><s%>

When they go, <S%H3212><s%> I will spread <S%H6566><s%> my net <S%H7568><s%> on them. <S%H3381><s%> I will bring them down like the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the sky. <S%H8064><s%> I will chastise <S%H3256><s%> them, <S%H5712><s%> as their congregation has heard. <S%H8088><s%>

Woe <S%H188><s%> to them! <S%H5074><s%> For they have wandered from me. <S%H7701><s%> Destruction to them! <S%H6586><s%> For they have trespassed against me. <S%H6299><s%> Though I would redeem them, <S%H1696><s%> yet they have spoken lies against me. <S%H3577><s%>

They haven't <S%H2199><s%> cried to me with their heart, <S%H3820><s%> but they howl <S%H3213><s%> on their beds. <S%H4904><s%> They assemble <S%H1481><s%> themselves for grain <S%H1715><s%> and new wine. <S%H8492><s%> They turn away from me. <S%H5493><s%>
Though I have taught <S%H3256><s%> and strengthened <S%H2388><s%> their arms, <S%H2220><s%> yet they plot <S%H2803><s%> evil against me. <S%H7451><s%>

They return, <S%H7725><s%> but not to the Most High. <S%H5920><s%> They are like a faulty <S%H7423><s%> bow. <S%H7198><s%> Their princes <S%H8269><s%> will fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%> for the rage <S%H2195><s%> of their tongue. <S%H3956><s%> This <S%H2097><s%> will be their derision <S%H3933><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
